report.title: Shorewatch Reporting: Sightings summary
report.description: A list of species summary data broken down by location and year, and optionally month and/or user. All data or just this year's..
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l1 JOIN ( SELECT l2.id, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM s1.date_start) AS year, CASE #month_breakdown# WHEN 0 THEN NULL ELSE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM s1.date_start) END AS month, CASE #observer_functionality_flag# WHEN 0 THEN '' ELSE (p.first_name||' '||p.surname) END AS observer, co.taxon, co.preferred_taxon, COUNT(distinct s1.id) AS number_watches, COUNT(distinct co.id) AS number_sightings, COUNT(distinct s1.created_by_id) AS number_observers, coalesce(sum(oav1.int_value), 0) AS number_adults, coalesce(sum(oav2.int_value), 0) AS number_calves, coalesce(sum(oav1.int_value), 0)+coalesce(sum(oav2.int_value), 0) AS total_individuals FROM locations l2 LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l2.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN samples s1 ON s1.location_id=l2.id AND s1.deleted=false AND s1.sample_method_id = #effort_sample_method_id# AND (#current_year# = 0 OR EXTRACT(YEAR FROM s1.date_start) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM now())) AND (#observer_functionality_flag# <= 0 OR s1.created_by_id = #observer_functionality_flag#) LEFT JOIN users u ON s1.created_by_id = u.id LEFT JOIN people p ON u.person_id = p.id LEFT JOIN samples s2 ON s2.parent_id = s1.id AND s2.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences co ON co.location_id = l2.id AND co.sample_id = s2.id LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav1 ON oav1.occurrence_id=co.id AND oav1.deleted=false AND oav1.occurrence_attribute_id = #adults_attr_id# LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav2 ON oav2.occurrence_id=co.id AND oav2.deleted=false AND oav2.occurrence_attribute_id = #calves_attr_id# #joins# WHERE l2.deleted=false AND #website_filter# #filters# GROUP BY l2.id, year, month, CASE #observer_functionality_flag# WHEN 0 THEN '' ELSE (p.first_name||' '||p.surname) END, co.taxon, co.preferred_taxon ) AS ldata ON ldata.id=l1.id WHERE ldata.preferred_taxon is NOT NULL

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

param.name: effort_sample_method_id
param.description: Select the effort sample method. Mandatory.

param.name: adults_attr_id
param.description: Select the occurrence attribute for "Number of adults" (this parameter is the attribute id, not the caption). Mandatory. This must be an integer attrbute.

param.name: calves_attr_id
param.description: Select the occurrence attribute for "Number of calves" (this parameter is the attribute id, not the caption). Mandatory. This must be an integer attrbute.

param.name: current_year
param.description: Optional boolean: value 0 (default) to include all data, value 1 to included only the current year.

param.name: month_breakdown
param.description: Optional boolean: value 0 (default) to only breakdown data by year, value 1 to break down the data further to month granularity.

param.name: observer_functionality_flag
param.description: Select observer functionality. Optional. -1 breaks down data by observer who created the effort, 0 (default if not provided) ignores observer, positive number filters by that observer.
